name: sn0topon

body.origin:
|- wcel(csn(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))
-| wceq(cpw(emptycls), csn(emptycls))
-| wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(csn(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))
-| wceq(cpw(emptycls), csn(emptycls))
-| wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))

|- wcel(csn(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))
-| wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))
-| wcel(emptycls, universe)
-| wi(wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(csn(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))
-| wcel(emptycls, universe)
-| wi(wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls)))

|- wcel(csn(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls))
-| wi(wcel(emptycls, universe), wcel(cpw(emptycls), cfv(ctopon, emptycls)))

comment: The singleton of the empty set is a topology on the empty set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
